text: The BAFTA Student Film Awards are an annual awards ceremony hosted by BAFTA as a showcase for rising industry talent. The animation award was sponsored in 2017 and 2018 by animation studio Laika. Variety.com 22 May 2018 Retrieved 20 March 2019 ==Awards== Awards & Prizes * Student Film Award for Animation * Student Film Award for Live Action * Student Film Award for Documentary ==References== ==External links== * Official site Retrieved 12 March 2019 Category:Film festivals in Los Angeles
title: BAFTA Student Film Awards
